biotools.summary: This software package has been developed to simulate various genome mutations including germline and somatic variations from next generation sequencing data, and also to generate read data from mixed genomes by considering moderate levels of tumor purity.

bioschemas.name: IntSIM
bioschemas.summary: This software package has been developed to simulate various genome mutations including germline and somatic variations from next generation sequencing data, and also to generate read data from mixed genomes by considering moderate levels of tumor purity.
